name: Captain Legend: Reborn
description:
◆Retro style of arcade game, positive confrontation with intense stimulation.

◆Video: https://youtu.be/XwmNM1BKUAc

◆When you are face to an increasingly powerful enemy, not only must get a powerful weapon, but also should carry out targeted weapon switching at the right time.

◆One person's strength is limited, so you have to save your teammates along the way, upgrade equipment for them. Let the enemy realize what is the numbers advantage.

◆In face to the enemy's terrible plot, you can call the air force support, you can also turn on the camouflage device to avoid danger. The battle is under your command.

◆Captain Legend is the first joined the tower defense gameplay, you must survive in the fierce attack, also should protect your own line of defense.

◆No gorgeous fireworks and powerful ability, only a group soldiers and 9 distinctive weapons, are you ready to face to the enemy attack? Captain?
